name: Iguazu Falls
description: This chain of gigantic waterfalls set amongst a teeming rainforest in northern Argentina is one of the world’s most beautiful natural wonders. Nothing can prepare you for the power and noise of the towering cascades.

reviews.message: The best place I've ever been!
Amazing experience, but it was a bit crowded.

name: The Great Barrier Reef, Australia
description: The world's largest coral reef system, a breathtaking underwater paradise teeming with marine life. A must-see for any diver or snorkeler!

reviews.message: The most incredible variety of coral and fish I've ever seen!
Be sure to book your snorkeling or diving trip in advance, especially during peak season.

name: The Eiffel Tower, France
description: A wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. An iconic landmark and a symbol of the City of Lights. Offers stunning panoramic views of Paris!

reviews.message: A romantic and unforgettable experience. The view from the top is breathtaking!
The lines can be quite long, so be prepared to wait. However, the view is definitely worth it.

name: Roma, Italia
description: La Ciudad Eterna, un tesoro de historia y arte. Desde el Coliseo hasta la Fontana di Trevi, Roma ofrece una experiencia inolvidable para los amantes de la cultura.

reviews.message: Roma es una ciudad que te enamora a primera vista. Cada esquina tiene una historia que contar.
La comida es deliciosa y la gente es muy amable. ¡Volvería sin dudarlo!
